mods.abstract: Ranaway FROM the Plantation of Mr. John B. Keller, at Bayou Chicot, about three months ago, a negro woman of a griff color, aged about 28 years, was formerly the property of Dr. Gober, of Ville Plate. She is supposed to be lurking about Ville Plate. Any person harboring said girl will be rigorously prosecuted to the full extent of the law. A liberal reward will be paid for her apprehension and delivery to the undersigned, at Washington, or if lodged in one of the Jails of this State so that I can get her back. F. TRAINOR. Washington, February 14, 1863.
